data.message: Why don't Facebook create a "I love you" in sign language? :)

replies.message: Hey Diana. We like where your head's at with this suggestion! We'll share this with our team. -Kristen

Dear Facebook. I have changed my page's URL, I was not informed when I accepted the change that I would not be allowed to change it again, and now I want to change the URL back the way it was. How can I do this?
Earlier it was : https://www.facebook.com/designs.sahil
Now it is : https://www.facebook.com/graphicdesigner.sahil
I want URL back as it was earlier i.e : https://www.facebook.com/designs.sahil

How can I do this? Please Help its Urgent.

Thankyou
